question.title: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "What is the most shocking news story you heard this year so far?", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}]}

answer.content: {"sections": [{"spans": [{"text": "In the mother of all ironies, Jack Merritt, one of the two people who were killed by the Islamic terrorist Usman Khan during the London Bridge knife attack was a Social Justice Warrior who supported the unfettered Islamic migration into the UK and was against the supposed \"systemic racism, bigotry & Islamophobia in western society.", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "He had also recently graduated from Cambridge University after submitting a thesis on the 'Over-Representation of Black, Asian & Minority Ethnic males in British Prisons' and supported early release of criminals from the prison (Usman Khan was released within 6 yrs of his 16 yr sentence).", "modifiers": {}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "plain", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-c72cd38b9c5b68e853059a0a5a98f37a", "height": 960, "width": 960, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-e4c8f5b7eeab7a9eabdebcfee4ee2bce", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-c7c9780e0d6edd5a10cf25579bf3c58b", "height": 960, "width": 709, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-ad8a8cd107977f0959b65f3f7e101b11", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}, {"spans": [{"text": "", "modifiers": {"image": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-296a0e84e41990b6e07c0f30ddf9c5d4", "height": 960, "width": 643, "master_url": "https://qph.fs.quoracdn.net/main-qimg-d54d216d14a4eafd20cfdb90f31646e6", "zoomable": true}}], "indent": 0, "quoted": false, "type": "image", "is_rtl": false}]}
